General.Name: Kangxin New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Kangxin New Materials Co., Ltd engages in the afforestation, wood deep processing, and design and production of construction structural lumber products in China. The company offers container plywood floor products, including COSB composite, multilayer solid wood, bamboo composite, and substrate material containers; civil board products, comprising COSB, construction, and EP boards; and landscape and green seedlings. It also produces wooden houses. Kangxin New Materials Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Xiaogan, China.
General.Address: No.1, Xinhe Industrial Park Road, Xiaogan, China

7.Name: Mr. Qi Li  Yang
